item.title: Make a custom right click menu
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:18, topic:300916”][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=397200.msg2949954#msg2949954 date=1252442257]

Credits? Plox?
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381208.0.html

/Repeat? Spam?

Anyways… He said

50% original maker of the first menu and tutorial

COULD mean you. MIGHT not.
He may have just done some code digging himself, too, y’know.

Then why does it look like my code?

Not all clients have different coding. :
[/quote]
This was a custom edit that Tonic did do originally, you can search for keyword “context” and find it. Also, yes all he did was change colors, its not hard to do with microsoft paint to grab hexidecimal color codes.

@Tonic - already got the link to your thread for ya.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Ah ic ic.
At least we got clarity that he needs to credit Tonic now
^^" He should fix it asap.

Read full topic

it took an hour per menu
[/quote]
How would it take an hour per menu? I bet in 30 mins, if i acually had the time to do it, i could have those colors marked for exactly what they re-colored in the bar, and use a HTML color chart and make one, its not that hard to recolor stuff imo.[/quote]

^^True.^^
